name: d3-dispatch
description: Register named callbacks and call them with arguments.

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-dispatch.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/d3-dispatch.js -c -m -o build/d3-dispatch.min.js
scripts.postpublish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git push --tags && cp build/d3-dispatch.js ../d3.github.com/d3-dispatch.v1.js && cp build/d3-dispatch.min.js ../d3.github.com/d3-dispatch.v1.min.js && cd ../d3.github.com && git add d3-dispatch.v1.js d3-dispatch.v1.min.js && git commit -m "d3-dispatch ${VERSION}" && git push && cd - && zip -j build/d3-dispatch.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-dispatch.js build/d3-dispatch.min.js
